channel.title: Mod question (not about forum)
channel.description: Ok so I'm using an open source client called, "JehanScape Client V1 Open source" what do I change to make my character a mod????

item.title: Mod question (not about forum)
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

go to the server file open it then look for a character file…After you already played on it…Then look for your name open the text file then look for something like character rights>=0 then change 0 to what ever you want:

0=normal 1=mod 2=admin 3=owner then save log on and you should be admin or mod or whatever

Read full topic
